text: Lee Ji-eun (born on May 16, 1993), is a South Korean singer. She goes by the stage name IU. She is working in EDAM Entertainment, a record label in Korea and she has won the Best New Artist Award in 2010. She is known for becoming a singer at a young age, with her first album when she was 15. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:K-pop singers Category:Guitarists Category:South Korean actors Category:South Korean singers
title: IU (singer)
